channel.title: Item problem with shop (pi)
channel.description: ok i added items to my shop they show up as nulls but ok say i type in ::item 15082 1 i get the item i see the item fine but in the shop it shows nulls can anyone help? i think i know why its set as item you cant trade. and item you cant buy how do i fix that? i fixed under config.java [code]public static final int[] ITEM_SELLABLE [/code]

item.title: Item problem with shop (pi)
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins1991 thomashawkins1991
item.description:
@thomashawkins1991 wrote:

ok i added items to my shop they show up as nulls but ok say i type in ::item 15082 1 i get the item i see the item fine but in the shop it shows nulls can anyone help?
i think i know why its set as item you cant trade. and item you cant buy how do i fix that?
i fixed under config.java
